title: Melbourne Sniper Internet Cafe LOL competition
body:
Hi summoner,
There is a LOL competition ceremony will be hold, Sniper internet cafe kindly invite every LOLer to attend it.
The rewards prize below:
1st $2000
2st $1200
3st $800
4-8st $200 each

if you has any interesting on it please contact email:jdmtechnology@hotmail.com

Waiting For You!{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
Ok, Here is info:

Sign up start from 1st Mar 2015 - 14th Mar 2015, which is around 2 week
we do sign up manually, which means you have to be there to sign up, the address of Sniper internet cafe is located at Level 3, 261 little lonsdale st.

For Sniper internet cafe's members, they are free for sign up. For non-member, is $20 for each person.

The tournament will be held on Sniper internet cafe, but the kick off time has not decided yet.


ideally, the progress would be 

32 to 16 BO1
16 to 8 BO1
quarter final (8 to 4) BO1
semi final (4 to 2) BO3
Final (BO5)

the prize spec are

1st team get $2000 in cash
2nd team get $1200 in cash
3rd team get $800 in cash
4th-8th get $200 each, in cash as well.

that's all i know so far.


FYI
we are not native english speaker, I apology for grammar issues.

Awesome, is there a page where people can go to to find all the event details?

I.e. a facebook event or website?

If you have a online presence with all details I mentioned earlier you can apply for prized events;
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/community/prized-events

Hey NeverMoerNN,

Great to see you're looking to host a tournament! Would love to get in touch and see how we can help.

Do you have a flyer you're using?
Is there an event page with the following details;

* What date and time is the tournament?
* Where is the tournament held? (address?)
* What is the tournament structure?
* Where is the sign up page?
* What are the rules?
